WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closed - This feature is in the works and will be available in Ribbon V1.
WorkItem.Description:
I am unable to add shortcut key to groups item in ribbon control.
can u provide any solution
WorkItem.Summary: How to add shortcut keys to ribbon control

Comments.Message: Hi, the feature you're looking for is KeyTips.  This is not included in the CTP, but will be available in V1.  I'm not sure if there's a good workaround in the meantime.  My recommendation would be to wait for the official solution in V1.

Can u give me date when the V1 is officially release.
If already released please give me download link.

Thank you.

V1 will be available in mid-2009.  That's as specific a date as I can give at this point.  We'll post an update to this site (likely under the Ribbon wiki page: http://www.codeplex.com/wpf/Wiki/View.aspx?title=WPF%20Ribbon%20Preview) as soon as we have an exact date.
